programme.title: Cars 2
Auti 2
programme.desc:
Cars 2: Directed by John Lasseter, Bradford Lewis. With Larry the Cable Guy, Owen Wilson, Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer. Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1216475/","name":"Cars 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTc3MTU3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzIxNTc3NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1216475/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"atrpunk"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not what my kids and I expected...","reviewBody":"Espionage, assassinations, sabotage of renewable energy, propaganda, corporate cover-ups, media manipulation and The Mob...

James Bond? Nope. Jason Bourne? Nope. 

Disney/Pixar's CARS 2. Wow. This movie wasn't at all what I was expecting. In the second serving of Lightning McQueen and his pals, they take their show to the international stage in a world championship race-off sponsored by oil-alternative manufacturer, Allinol. But turmoil behind the scenes pulls the gang into a world of spies, the Mob, Big Oil, evil German scientists and hit men. Now they have to save the world before it's too late. Oh, and they race too. The animation is amazing. Water, large balloons, backgrounds during races...pay attention because the quality of the graphics in this one are world-class. There are some goofy, funny moments and some nice one- liners for the older crowd. The themes of being true to yourself and bonds of friendship run strong throughout this film but it's the remainder of the message that worried me. There were non-stop put downs throughout and some other questionable topics. I was beginning to question the G rating when the villain ordered his henchmen to "kill" several other cars. Thinking back to the innocence and the good spirit of the first movie, I began to wonder how we got from there to here. Adventures in racing take a back-seat to the more mature plot of an espionage thriller. Looking around the theater, I could tell that kids younger than 4 or 5 were beginning to get lost. Even my ten-year-old had a hard time understanding the socio-political messages. On top of all that, I'd be willing to bet that Cars 2 is a contender for most guns, explosions and bullets fired in a G-Rated movie. This movie had much more violence than the first one.

Aside from the appropriateness of the movie, it wasn't bad. All the likable characters from the first movie were back with bigger roles like 'Mater & Luigi and there were many new characters added that also brought their own personalities into the mix. To me, this was an espionage-thriller so the added bonus of some comedy made the movie move right along at a good pace. 

It was engaging for me, I enjoyed it, but the entire time I couldn't help but wonder why Disney/Pixar chose to tell this story through a kids movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":173686,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-06-24","keywords":"car race,car,best friend,spy,conspiracy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Â“Tokyo PartyÂ”","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1822465049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from Cars 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1249256/","name":"Larry the Cable Guy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000323/","name":"Michael Caine"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

But turmoil behind the scenes pulls the gang into a world of spies, the Mob, Big Oil, evil German scientists and hit men. Now they have to save the world before it's too late. Oh, and they race too. The animation is amazing. Water, large balloons, backgrounds during races...pay attention because the quality of the graphics in this one are world-class. There are some goofy, funny moments and some nice one- liners for the older crowd. The themes of being true to yourself and bonds of friendship run strong throughout this film but it's the remainder of the message that worried me. There were non-stop put downs throughout and some other questionable topics. I was beginning to question the G rating when the villain ordered his henchmen to "kill" several other cars. Thinking back to the innocence and the good spirit of the first movie, I began to wonder how we got from there to here. Adventures in racing take a back-seat to the more mature plot of an espionage thriller. Looking around the theater, I could tell that kids younger than 4 or 5 were beginning to get lost. Even my ten-year-old had a hard time understanding the socio-political messages. On top of all that, I'd be willing to bet that Cars 2 is a contender for most guns, explosions and bullets fired in a G-Rated movie. This movie had much more violence than the first one.

Aside from the appropriateness of the movie, it wasn't bad. All the likable characters from the first movie were back with bigger roles like 'Mater & Luigi and there were many new characters added that also brought their own personalities into the mix. To me, this was an espionage-thriller so the added bonus of some comedy made the movie move right along at a good pace. 

It was engaging for me, I enjoyed it, but the entire time I couldn't help but wonder why Disney/Pixar chose to tell this story through a kids movie.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":173686,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-06-24","keywords":"car race,car,best friend,spy,conspiracy","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Â“Tokyo PartyÂ”","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1822465049","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from Cars 2","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1249256/","name":"Larry the Cable Guy","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000323/","name":"Michael Caine"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"],"duration":"PT1H46M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Twister
Tornado
programme.desc:
Twister: Directed by Jan de Bont. With Helen Hunt, Bill Paxton, Cary Elwes, Jami Gertz. Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0117998/","name":"Twister","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODExYTM0MzEtZGY2Yy00N2ExLTkwZjItNGYzYTRmMWZlOGEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Bill and Jo Harding, advanced storm chasers on the brink of divorce, must join together to create an advanced weather alert system by putting themselves in the cross-hairs of extremely violent tornadoes.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0117998/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"DigitalHuman"},"dateCreated":"2003-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":""It was windy."","reviewBody":"Solid follow up film for former cinematographer (it shows) Jan DeBont who's previous film 'Speed' redefined the action genre and added, well, speed, to the mix. He has a talent for making films that are extremely kinetic and seem to actually MOVE and Twister is no different.

The story is simple, we follow a group of storm chasers around tornado alley for 48hrs during the most active otbreak of tornao activity on record (not unlike what actually occured this past month in Oklahoma) all the while watching an estranged couple played by Hunt and Paxton fall in love again amongst the windswept action.

The tornados are awe inspiring works of digital wonder created by ILM and really come across as powerful. They're not so much portrayed as ordinary storms, but rather angry demons from above who wreak havoc on the landscape, they even roar like lions at times! Great film. And to those that think this film doesn't translate well to the home, you obviously don't have a Home Theater set up with Dolby Digital and DTS 5.1! The film RIVALS what I got at the theater in my home!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":188273,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"datePublished":"1996-05-10","keywords":"crashing a car into a house,drive in theater,drive in movie,storm chaser,disaster","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Twister","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2145386777","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTc2MTEzMDAtOGVmNS00MjYxLWFiZWMtYTkwMmFkYjk5OGUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTc2MTEzMDAtOGVmNS00MjYxLWFiZWMtYTkwMmFkYjk5OGUxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000166/","name":"Helen Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000200/","name":"Bill Paxton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000144/","name":"Cary Elwes"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000957/","name":"Jan de Bont"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0009119/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000341/","name":"Michael Crichton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0551926/","name":"Anne-Marie Martin"}],"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Garancia
programme.desc: Pasi luftuan krah për krah në Luftën Civlie Amerikane, dy miq të ngushtë e gjejnë veten përballë njëri - tjetrit, në dy anët e kundërta të ligjit, ndërsa paqja e pasluftës është në rrezik.
programme.category: Uestern

programme.title: Çakalli
programme.desc: Bruce Willis, Richard Gere. Një vrasës gjakftohtë, mjeshtër i maskimit është pajtuar për të asgjesuar një anëtar të lartë të qeverisë. I vetmi që mund të ndihmojë në kapjen e tij është një terrorist që gjendet pas hekurave të burgut.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Beteja e të mallkuarve
programme.desc: Dolph Lundgren, Matt Doran, Lydia Look. Pas një virusi që i kthen njerëzit në zombi, një ushtar privat vihet në krye të disa të mbijetuarve dhe disa robotëve, në përpjekje për të eliminuar rrezikun...
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Vëllezërit Njuton
programme.desc: M.McConaughey, E.Hawke. Viti 1920. Vëllezërit Njuton vijnë nga një familje e varfër. Vëllai i madh jep idenë se ata duhet të bëhen grabitës bankash. Ata bëhen të famshëm dhe kryejnë grabitjen më famëkeqe të një treni në historinë e SHBA-s.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Burrat me të zeza 3
programme.desc: Will Smith, Tommy Lee Jones, Josh Brolin. Agjentit Xhei do ti duhet te kthehet në të kaluarën për të shpëtuar partnerin e tij dhe të ardhmen e njerëzimit. Por atje do të zbulojë një sekret që kolegu i tij, s'ia kishte treguar kurrë...
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë
komedi

programme.title: Njësia e heronjve
programme.desc: Në fund të Luftës II Botërore, disa ushtarë amerikanë zbulojnë se Hitleri po zhvillon një super bombë dhe se shkencëtari nazist që e ka krijuar, kërkon të dezertojë. Kundër çdo mundësie, ata nisin 1 mision të rrezikshëm për ta ndihmuar.
programme.category: Aksion/Luftë

programme.title: Spiunët e Varshavës Pj. 1
programme.desc: David Tennant, Janet Montgomery. Në prag të Luftës së Dytë Botërore, një atashe ushtarak në ambasadën franceze në Varshavë, fillon një romancë të zjarrtë, por përfshihet edhe në një botë spiunazhi dhe tradhtish.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Goditje në Java
programme.desc: Kellan Lutz, Verdi Solaiman, Mickey Rourke. Një hetues mysliman, bashkon forcat me një amerikan, në përpjekje për të gjetur një terrorist përgjegjës për disa bomba vdekjeprurëse në Java të Indonezisë..
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Policë të korruptuar
programme.desc: 2012. 50 Cent, Robert De Niro, Forest Whitaker. Djali i një polici të vrarë, i bashkohet skuadrës së partnerit të babait të tij, të cilët veprojnë sipas një kodi të caktuar. Por, këtu, ai do të zbulojë të vërtetën mbi vdekjen e të atit...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Luftanija
programme.desc: Taylor Kitsch, Brooklyn Decker, Liam Neeson. Bazuar ne lojën mjaft popullore të betejave në det. Një flotë ndërkombëtare në mision trajnimi, zbulon disa qënie jashtëtokësore që kanë si qëllim shfarrosjen e jetës mbi tokë...
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Agimi i kuq
programme.desc: 2012. Chris Hemsworth. Banorët e nje qyteze, zgjohen të tmerruar nga shpërthimet dhe ushtarë koreano veriorë, që po zbresin me parashutë. Një grup të rinjsh, të drejtuar nga një ish marins, fillojnë një mision për të shpëtuar qytezën e tyre...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Në kërkim të së vërtetës
programme.desc: Kur miku i tij i ngushtë vritet ndërsa po hetonte një bandë të dyshimtë, një sherif në pension merr përsipër ta zgjidhë vetë çështjen, por e gjen veten në mes të një rrjeti vdekjeprures korrupsioni.
programme.category: Uestern

programme.title: Largo Uinç
programme.desc: Pas vrasjes së një miliarderi, djali i tij i birësuar në fshehtësi, duhet të nisë përpjekjet për të vërtetuar legjimitetin e tij dhe për të zbuluar vrasësit e të atit, të cilët duan të shtien në dorë perandorinë e tij financiare.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Para gjaku
programme.desc: 2012. Një vrasës tepër i aftë me një të kaluar të errët, e gjen veten në mes të një lufte të egër midis grupeve kriminale sekrete të Hong Kongut dhe tregtarëve të mëdhenj kolumbianë të drogës.
programme.category: Aksion
arte marciale

programme.title: Gara e hakmarrjes
programme.desc: Jackie Chan. Jackie Chan. Pasi ndihmon heroikisht policinë të arrestojë liderin e garave të paligjshme me makina të Hong Kongut, Foh, një mekanik i thjeshtë, duhet të përballet me të në një garë vendimtare, pasi ai arratiset nga burgu.
programme.category: Aksion
sport
krim

programme.title: Kundërgrushti
programme.desc: Bazuar në histori të vërtetë. Një boksier i ri, nga lagjet e varfëra të Majemit, me ëndrrën për të fituar Kampionatin e Dorezave të Arta, e gjen veten në udhekryq pasi diagnostifikohet me sëmundjen e bipolaritetit.
programme.category: Aksion
sport

programme.title: Pushtimi i fundit
programme.desc: Pas rrëzimit të një anijeje jashtëtokësore ne vitin 1947, një skuadër e specialzuar krijohet për të mbrojtur njerëzit. Por jashtëtokësorët sulmojnë 66 vjet më pasdhe pjestarët e skuadrës të dalë në pension, janë shpresa e vetme për shpëtim.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Engjëlli i vdekjes
programme.desc: Steven Steven Seagal, Sarah Lind.Elijah Kane, dhe skuadra e tij po gjurmojnë dy pajisje nukleare që janë futur ilegalisht dhe kërkohen të blihen nga një kriminel. Por sa më shumë i afrohen gjetjes, aq më i rrezkishëm bëhet misioni.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Hirokin: Samurai i fundit
programme.desc: Wes Bentley, Jessica Szohr, Angus Macfadyen. Në një planet ku njerëzit janë të nënshtruar, Hirokin një samurai me një të kaluar të errët, ndërmerr një mision të rrezikshëm për të përmbushur fatin e tij...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Spiunët e Varshavës Pj. 2
programme.desc: David Tennant, Janet Montgomery. Në prag të Luftës së Dytë Botërore, një atashe ushtarak në ambasadën franceze në Varshavë, fillon një romancë të zjarrtë, por përfshihet edhe në një botë spiunazhi dhe tradhtish.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Forcat e ndërhyrjes së shpejtë
programme.desc: Ray Winstone, Ben Drew. Bazuar në serialin anglez mjaft të suksesshëm të viteve 1970. Një skuadër e policisë së Londrës, përdor të njëjtat taktika brutale si dhe kriminelët, për t'ju dhënë ndëshkimin e merituar.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: 6 plumba
programme.desc: Një mercenar (Jean-Claude Van Damme), specialiteti i të cilit është gjetja e fëmijëve të zhdukur, punësohet nga një kampion i arteve marciale (Joe Flanigan) që i kanë rrëmbyer vajzën...
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Jo pa vajzën time
programme.desc: Sally Field, Alfred Molina. Bazuar në historinë e vërtetë të Betty Mahmoody. E mbajtur forcërisht në Iran nga bashkëshorti, një grua amerikane bën të pamundurën që të largohet bashkë me vajzën e saj.
programme.category: Histori e vërtetë

programme.title: Medison
programme.desc: Jim Caviezel. Krenaria e Medisonit, Indiana, hidroplani kish hyrë në 1971 në garën për Kupën e Artë. I përzgjedhuri për të pilotuar avionin është Jim McCormick, i cili sakrifikon të ardhmen e familjes për të marrë pjesë në garë.
programme.category: Dramë
sport

programme.title: Nesër mund të jetë vonë
programme.desc: Shah Rukh Khan, Preity Zinta, Saif Ali Khan. Jeta e një vajze të mbyllur në vetvete nga problemet në familje, do të ndryshojë përgjithmonë nga ardhja e fqinjit të saj të ri, i cili i mëson të shijojë çdo moment të jetës.
programme.category: Një histori Indie

programme.title: Më fal, por të dua për nuse
programme.desc: Raoul Bova, Michela Quattrociocche. Aleksi dhe Niki, edhe pse me diferencë moshe të madhe, janë ende të dashuruar dhe kanë vendosur të martohen. Por sa më shumë afrohet dita e madhe, aq më shumë e ardhmja e tyre vihet në pikëpyetje...
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Me ardhjen e mëngjesit
programme.desc: Lusi, një vajzë tek të 30-at, ka rënë në rrethin vicioz të alkolit dhe seksit rastesor për një natë. Që të kalojë këtë faze vetëshkatërruese, duhet të gërmoje në të kaluarën e familjes dhe të kuptojë arsyen që e ka çuar në këtë rrugë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Në ëndrrat e mia
programme.desc: Katharine McPhee, Mike Vogel. Pasi hedhin monedha në një shatërvan, dy njerëz të pafat në dashuri, fillojnë ta shohin njëri tjetrin në ëndërr. Por sipas legjendës së shatërvanit, ata kanë vetëm 1 javë kohë për t'u takuar...
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Leksione private
programme.desc: J.Walters. Ben bën të pamunduren për t'i shpëtuar ndikimit të nënës së tij autoritare. Ndërsa shokët e tij argetohen, ai merr mësime katekizmi. Bota e tij do të ndryshoje kur ai fillon të punojë për Evin, një ish aktore e famshme.
programme.category: Drame

programme.title: Pijedashësit
programme.desc: Olivia Wilde, Jake Johnson. Luka dhe Kejti janë kolegë që kalojnë darkat duke pirë dhe flirtuar, dhe të dy janë të lidhur. me persona të tjerë. Një fundjavë me të dashurit reciprokë vërteton se kush duhet të jetë me kë dhe kush jo!
programme.category: Dramë romantike

programme.title: Ringritja
programme.desc: Gwyneth Paltrow, Tim McGraw. Në kërkim të ringritjes në karrierë, një këngëtare dikur e famshme, bashkëpunon me një kompozitor të talentuar dhe shumë shpejt mes tyre lind një romancë e ngatërruar, që rrezikon të shkatërrojë gjithçka...
programme.category: Dramë
muzikë

programme.title: Frenki dhe Eliza
programme.desc: H. Berry. Bazuar në historinë e vëtetë të kërcimtares afro-amerikane Frenki, me personalitete të shumëfishta: 7-vjeçarin Xhenius dhe gruan raciste me emrin Eliza. Me ndihmën e psikoterapistit, ajo do të kuptojë arsyen e krijimit të tyre.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Jeta virtuale
programme.desc: Jason Bateman, Hope Davis. Të panjohur, fqinjë e kolegë, botët e të cilëve ndërthuren, ndërkohë që përpiqen të lundrojnë në jetën e çuditshme virutale, në të cilën jetojmë të gjithë.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Pesha e një ëndrre
programme.desc: Një aktore dikur e famshme në filmat komercialë, përpiqet dëshpërimisht të mbijetojë në biznesin e kinemasë. Pranë të 40-tave dhe me një karrierë në rënie, ajo lufton pa u dorëzuar për të fituar role të reja, por me çfarë kostoje?
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: Ftesë në çift
programme.desc: 2019. Beni dhe Alisa, shokë prej gjimnazit, duke qënë ende beqarë, bien dakort të shoqërojnë njëri-tjetrin në çdo dasmë ku janë të ftuar. Por shoqëria e gjatë dhe e fortë, vihet në provë pas një nate ku ata i kalojnë kufitjë e miqësisë.
programme.category: Romancë

programme.title: Huliganët 3
programme.desc: Scott Adkins, Kacey Clarke. Pasi vëllai i tij vritet në një dyluftim artesh marciale të jashtëligjshëm, një huligan futet në te njëjtin rrjet me qëllim që të hakmerret për vdekjen e tij.
programme.category: Aksion/Arte marciale

programme.title: Mamma Mia 2
programme.desc: Meryl Streep, Amanda Seyfried, Cher. Kanë kaluar 10 vjet nga ngjarjet e fundit në ishullin e magjishëm të Kalokairit. Sofia është shtatëzënë, dhe njësoj si e ëma në të shkuarën, edhe ajo do të duhet të rrezikojë pak në të tashmen.
programme.category: Muzikal / Komedi romantike

programme.title: Vetë jeta
programme.desc: Oscar Isaac, Olivia Wilde, Annette Bening, Antonio Banderas. Historitë e disa çifteve përgjatë gjeneratave të ndryshme dhe se si ato janë të lidhura me njëra - tjetrën nga një ngjarje e vetme.
programme.category: Dramë

programme.title: 47 metra nën det
programme.desc: Mandy Moore, Claire Holt. Dy motra me pushime në Meksikë, bllokohen në një kafaz hekuri 47 metra nën det. Me vetëm 1 orë oksigjen dhe me peshkaqenë të shumtë që sillen rrotull, ato duhet të gjejnë sa më shpejt një mënyrë për të mbijetuar.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Po qe e shkruar
programme.desc: Leonardo Pieraccioni. Një baba i divorcuar detyrohet të përballet me dashuritë e tij të shkuara, kur e bija adoleshente, fshehurazi, u dërgon një mesazh ish të dashurave të tij: 'Kam ndryshuar. E provojmë sërish.'.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Shoqëria sekrete e trashëgimtarëve të dy
programme.desc: Samanta, një princeshë rebele, e dyta në rradhë për fronin e mbretërisë së Ilirisë, mëson se ka aftësi mbinjerëzore dhe ftohet t'i bashkohet , 'Shoqërisë Sekrete të Trashëgimtarëve të Dytë Mbretërorë', që ka mision të ruajë paqen në botë.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë
komedi

programme.title: Gjithçka që dëshiron
programme.desc: 22 vjeçari Alesandro pranon të bëjë shoqëruesin e Xhorxhos, një poeti 85-vjeçar me 'Alzheimer'. Bisedat mes tyre sjellin në sipërfaqe copëza kujtimesh të Xhorxhos, të cilat i drejtojnë ata në një gjueti thesari, me përfundim të papritur...
programme.category: Komedi
dramë

programme.title: Alfa
programme.desc: Në të kaluarën parahistorike, një i ri përpiqet të kthehet në shtëpi pasi u nda nga fisi i tij gjatë një gjuetie. Ai gjen një ujk të plagosur e të braktisur dhe sëbashku fillojnë një miqësi që do të ndryshojë njerëzimin.
programme.category: Aventurë
histori

programme.title: Shpirti
programme.desc: G.Macht, E.Mendes. Në rrugët e Central City-it një njeri simulon vdekjen e tij duke u shndërruar në fantazëm. Denny Colt, polici i vrarë do të rilindë në petkun e Shpirtit, luftëtari i maskuar kundër krimit që do t'i vihet pas psikopatit Okapusit.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Në strofullën e hajdutëve
programme.desc: G. Butler. Çdo ditë, 120 milionë dollarë hiqen nga qarkullimi dhe asgjësohen nga Rezervat Federale të L. A. Tani, një ekip elitar grabitësish bankash, si punë të fundit, do përpiqen t'i marrin këto para nën hundën e forcave të rendit...
programme.category: Aksion
Dramë

programme.title: Në ring me familjen
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson, Lena Headey. Bazuar në jetën e mundëses profesioniste 'Page'. Kur ajo fiton audicionin në kompaninë e mundjes WWE, mëson se të bëhesh një yll në këtë sport, kërkon më shumë seç kishte imagjinuar të ishte e mundur.
programme.category: Biografi
sport
komedi
dramë

programme.title: Pasagjerët
programme.desc: Chris Pratt, Jennifer Lawrence. Kandidat për 2 Oskar dhe 7 çmime të tjera! Një anije kozmike që po udhëton drejt një planeti të largët me mijëra njerëz në bord, pëson një avari që shkakton zgjimin nga gjumi të 2 njerëzve, 90 vite përpara se të arrijn.
programme.category: Fantashkencë
romancë
aventurë

programme.title: Pothuaj e përkryer
programme.desc: Kristen Wiig, Annette Bening. Pasi karriera teatrale dhe jeta romantike e një vajze në Nju Jork, merr të tatëpjetën, ajo detyrohet të kthehet në qytezën e lindjes, ku e presin një sërë karakteresh nga të cilët ishte përpjekur të largohej.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Zgjedhja e duhur
programme.desc: Një don zhuan që kërkon t'u vërtetojë miqëve të tij se është imun ndaj dashurisë, pranon të lidhet me një vajzë për një muaj. Por sa më shumë kohë kalon me të dashurën e tij të re, aq më tepër veniten parimet e tij...
programme.category: Komedi
romancë

programme.title: Jeta është e mrekullueshme
programme.desc: Gigi Proietti, Nancy Brilli, Vincenzo Salemme. Jetët e ndërthurura të disa njerëzve, të gjithë në kërkim të lumturisë. Edhe pse të gjithë kanë probleme e sfida të përditshme. jeta është e mrekullueshme.
programme.category: Komedi Italiane

programme.title: Telashe në kuzhinë
programme.desc: Lidhja e fortë mes dy kushërirave kriset prej mosmarrëveshjeve mbi menaxhimin e pastiçerisë që trashëguan nga halla e tyre. Por kur dyqani rrezikon mbylljen, ato përveshin mëngët dhe së bashku gatuajnë një plan për ta shpëtuar.
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Zjarrfikësit
programme.desc: Paolo Villaggio, Massimo Boldi, Christian De Sica. Zjarrfikësit njihen për trimërinë dhe zotësinë e tyre, përveç skuadrës 17. Ata njihen vetëm për paaftësi, por tani kanë vendosur se ka ardhur koha që të ndryshojnë reputacion.
programme.category: Komedia Italiane

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy, Thandie Newton. Norbit, gjithmonë ka pasur një jetë të vështirë, por në prag të martesës me Rasputian e tmerrshme, gjërat po përkeqësohen. Kthimi në qytet i Kejtit, mund t'i japë një kthesë të këndshme jetës së tij.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Lojë policësh
programme.desc: Jake Johnson, Damon Wayans Jr. Dy miq vishen si policë për një festë me kostume. Por kur këta dy 'heronj' të sapo shfaqur ngatërrohen me kriminelë e detektivë të korruptuar, duan apo s'duan do t'u duhet të sillen si mbrojtës të ligjit...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Profesori boksier
programme.desc: Kevin James, Bas Rutten, Salma Hayek. Nje 40-të vjeçar, aspak në formë, punon si mësues bilogjie. Por kur problemet ekonomike, kërcënojnë ta nxjerrin të papunë, ai fillon të ndeshet në ring edhe pse nuk ia thotë fare nga ky profesion...
programme.category: Komedi
sport

programme.title: Dashuri mbi tastierë
programme.desc: Romain Duris, Déborah François. Viti 1958. Një 21 vjeçare që nuk ia thotë shumë si sekretare por që është shumë e shpejtë në makinë shkrimi, ndihmohet nga shefi i saj simpatik që të marrë pjesë në një konkurs kombëtar.
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Taksisti këngëtar
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone, Dolly Parton. Një këngëtare kauntri, e dëshpëruar për t'u çliruar nga një kontratë afatgjatë, vë bast me menaxherin e klubit ku punon se mund kthejë çdo person në një këngëtar të shkëlqyer, në vetëm dy javë...
programme.category: Komedi
musical

programme.title: Dashuri dhe telashe
programme.desc: Paula Patton, Laz Alonso. Sabrina dhe Xhejson, kanë vendosur të martohen. Të dy janë afroamerikanë, por familjet e tyre janë shumë ndryshe nga njëra-tjetra dhe kur ato takohen gjithçka kthehet përmbys...
programme.category: Komedi romantike

programme.title: Tifozët
programme.desc: Massimo Boldi, Christian De Sica, Diego Abatantuono, Diego Armando Maradona. Aventurat e një grupi tifozësh të çmendur, të cilët janë gati të bëjnë çdo gjë për skuadrën e zemrës, madje të falin edhe gjithçka që kanë.
programme.category: Komedia italiane

programme.title: Rojtarët e lagjes
programme.desc: B.Stiller, V.Vaughn. Për t'i shpëtuar monotonisë, katër miq krijojnë një skuadër për ruajtjen e lagjes. Por kur zbulojnë se në lagje kanë zbritur jashtëtokësorë që do të pushtojnë botën, ata hidhen në sulm për të shpëtuar njerëzimin...
programme.category: Komedi

programme.title: Çmimi i pafajësisë
programme.desc: Kur një 13-vjeçare rrëmbehet në Meksikë nga një rrjet prostitucioni, vëllai i saj adoleshent nis një kërkim të dëshpëruar për ta shpëtuar. Ndërsa ndjek hapat e rrëmbyesve, ai takon një polic teksan, historia e të cilit, e bën atë aleatin e tij.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Masakra e Politeknikut
programme.desc: Bazuar në ngjarje tragjike të vërtetë. Në dhjetor të vitit 1989, një burrë i trazuar u nis drejt kampusit të Politeknikut, në Montreal, me një qëllim të vetëm në mendje: Të qëllonte mbi sa më shumë gra që kishte mundësi.
programme.category: Dramë
krim

programme.title: Djallëzia
programme.desc: Një profesor i ri kolegji dhe gruaja e tij shtatzënë hapin një kuti misterioze antike që gjejnë në shtëpinë e tyre të re dhe çlirojnë një shpirt të lig të etur për të vrarë.
programme.category: Horror
thriller

programme.title: Rrugëtim në frikë
programme.desc: Një djalë dhe një vajzë që me makinë po përpiqen të shkojnë në një koncert muzikor, ngatërrojnë rrugën dhe fillojnë të terrorizohen nga një njeri misterioz...
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Shlyerja e borxhit
programme.desc: Xhimi, kriminel i regjur, ka vetëm një natë kohë për të shlyer një borxh dhe për të fituar përsëri zemrën e ish të dashurës, por asnjë nga këto qëllime nuk do të jetë e lehtë për t'u arritur.
programme.category: Thriller
krim

programme.title: Pushtet absolut
programme.desc: Clint Eastwood, Gene Hackman, Ed Harris. Një hajdut rastësisht kthehet në dëshmitar okular të një krimi. Gjithçka merr një rrjedhë tjetër në çastin kur zbulohet se në krim përfshihet vetë presidenti i shtetit.
programme.category: Krim
thriller

programme.title: Hëna
programme.desc: Ndërkohë që kontratës së tij 3 vjeçare si minator në Hënë po i vjen fundi, njeriu i vetëm (Sam Rockwell) që ndodhet aty, bën një zbulim që vendos në dilemë gjithçka që ai ka njohur deri më tani...
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Huta
programme.desc: Ricardo Darín. Aksidentet janë shkaku kryesor i vdekjeve në Argjentinë dhe Sosa është një avokat që përfiton nga fatkeqësitë e të tjerëve. E dashura e tij mjeke e shtyn të dalë nga ky biznes, por e kaluara e tij nuk fshihet aq thjeshtë.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Tarraca në Leikvju
programme.desc: Samuel L. Jackson. Një çift ndër-racial shpërngulet në shtëpinë e ëndrrave, por gjendet vazhdimisht nën shënjestrën e sulmeve dhe ngacmimeve të fqinjit të tyre, një oficer policie me ngjyrë që është vetëquajtur 'sherifi i lagjes'.
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Aladdin
Aladin
programme.desc:
Aladdin: Directed by Ron Clements, John Musker. With Scott Weinger, Robin Williams, Linda Larkin, Jonathan Freeman. A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0103639/","name":"Aladdin","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2Q2NDI1MjUtM2Q5ZS00MTFlLWJiYWEtNTZmNjQ3OGJkZDgxXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTI4MjkwNjA@._V1_.jpg","description":"A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0103639/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ElMaruecan82"},"dateCreated":"2011-12-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Forever a favorite of mine ...","reviewBody":"I will never forget the first time I watched "Aladdin", I was with a group of friends waiting in the airport for the plane that would take us from Orlando to Paris at the time when "Aladdin" was the 'big thing' in the USA while some previews of "The Lion King" were starting to screen. "Aladdin" will forever be associated to that wonderful week I spent in Disneyland, and it's only fitting if the movie is my favorite Disney film, slightly edging-out "The Jungle Book".

I know I can get all rational in this review, analyzing what makes "Aladdin" such an appealing film and using the expected words of 'Disney Renaissance' and a comparison with the glorious Best Picture nominee predecessor. I can also talk about the animation, the music, the extraordinary multi-vocal performance of Robin Williams as Genie but I don't feel like getting rational. I love the film for personal reasons that are essentially due to the excellent timing of this film in its penetration of my pre-adolescent life. "Aladdin" took a forever cherished place as one of the last treasures that enriched my childhood even playing a pivotal role in the way I would start enjoying cartoons.

"Kid's day in the USA!" was the motto of the week that was celebrating the 65th birthday of Mickey Mouse, and for a kid who never traveled outside his country, going to Disneyland was the most unexpected destination, the most extraordinary trip I would never have dared to dream of. This is when I discovered "Aladdin", through the 'Prince Ali' fanfare endlessly performed during the parades, through the films' images aired on TV; something was strangely attracting me to the film. And I guess the fact that I knew the story helped a lot: I grew up with a French cartoon from 1969, titled 'Aladin and the Magic Lamp' recorded in an 80's videocassette, a movie I can recite (and sing) by heart, and there was also an obscure Manga 'Aladdin' film we watched at school before the summer holidays.

Needless to say I was already familiar with the story, and seeing it translated into Disney language was something I was excited to see. Would they talk about Aladdin's deceased father Mustapha? Would he live with his mother? What kind of roles would Genie play? Well one thing matters apart from these questions: I knew the story and I could understand the film even if I didn't speak English at that time it wouldn't have helped me anyway because the airport was very noisy, so I just sat on my luggage, eating some candies, and I could understand who was who and what was everyone's scheme: obviously, Aladdin wanted to be a prince to marry the princess and Jafar to marry the princess to become the prince, and between them, the Genie would come to fulfill their dreams. So, I saw the film and I loved it.

And for one year, before I would see it again, the music of 'Pince Ali' and 'A Whole New World' was the musical remembrance of that magical week in Disney World. And when I saw it again, it took another dimension: I finally understood the subtleties of the stories, I learned all the songs after repetitive viewings, and for months and months, I was transported by the 'Prince Ali' parade and its climactic conclusion and the romantic 'A Whole New World' and its beautiful opening, when Jasmine jumps on the carpet and the zoomed-out Rajah looks smaller and smaller, watching from the balcony. I saw the film so many times during my pre-teen years that I would never forget the first sensations it immersed me into, with an unexpected awkward one.

I must confess that Jasmine was one of my first movie crushes and my idea of the ideal woman as a kid, I don't know why but the way she looked during the 'love at first sight moment' hypnotized me and the moment where I always melt occurs in the carpet ride, when Aladdin gives her the apple, when you understand that she understood who the Prince Ali is, there are no words to describe how incredibly sexy she looks at that very moment. The crush didn't last of course, and as I grew older and was disappointed with the 'Return of Jafar' sequel and the TV series, my interest for "Aladdin" declined and it was reduced to 'kid's stuff I used to like'.

And then 10 years later, as a student, I saw the film again on my computer, eating a pizza, and something magical happened when the 'Whole New World' music started during the closing credits, my heart was inundated by a nostalgic torrent, so immense that I couldn't stop crying because it reminded me of the privileged place the movie occupied once in my heart. The magic was back, and whenever I was spending a good time with friends, we were having fun listening to these old Disney songs, and the clip of 'A Whole New World' was a must-see and how glad I was to discover that I wasn't the only one who 'liked' Jasmine.

I feel so concerned by this film and so deeply attached to it, that I don't want to spoil this review with critical or ecstatic reviews, the film is just thrilling, romantic, adventurous, and features certainly the greatest cast of supporting characters without it being the counterpart of a dull hero or heroine, there's not a single minute of the film that seems pointless and wasted and certainly not with a character like Genie. That's the best I could do to rationally 'explain' my love for "Aladdin".

But maybe because loving a film can also depend on external factors that influence your judgment, in the case of "Aladdin", everything contributed to make this my favorite Disney film ... for sentimental reasons yes, but who ever said they were wrong?","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":389662,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"1992-11-25","keywords":"genie,three wishes,genie character,arab,princess","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi677035801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQyMjRhYjUtOGM1My00OTQzLWEzZTAtOThjM2Q3OTMyNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQyMjRhYjUtOGM1My00OTQzLWEzZTAtOThjM2Q3OTMyNmRjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0918334/","name":"Scott Weinger"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000245/","name":"Robin Williams"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0488306/","name":"Linda Larkin"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0166256/","name":"Ron Clements"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615780/","name":"John Musker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0133018/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074039/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0166256/","name":"Ron Clements"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0615780/","name":"John Musker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0254645/","name":"Ted Elliott"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Green Lantern: Directed by Martin Campbell. With Ryan Reynolds, Blake Lively, Peter Sarsgaard, Mark Strong. Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1133985/","name":"Green Lantern","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjQ1YTIxNzEtMzcxNC00NTUzLThkZjktMmJlYTcyMjBhMGUyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Reckless test pilot Hal Jordan is granted an alien ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers that inducts him into an intergalactic police force, the Green Lantern Corps.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1133985/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"BigMaxAttacks"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"It wasn't that bad, why the hate?","reviewBody":"I saw Green Lantern with my son because it looked safe enough and I used to collect the comic books when I was a kid. I felt like I was the only guy over 20 at the theater, which I guess isn't surprising anymore. Did think there would be more adults, however, because the Green Lantern was something we read in my generation. Not sure if it's even around anymore. Being a fan of the comic book I had to go see it, and I was intrigued with the movie. After I got home I jumped on the computer and read the reviews. I was very disappointed with the professional reviews that cast stones at it, while at the same time, regular folk like myself thought it was a pretty good stab at the DC comic book version. I guess I look for something different when I go to the movies. I go to unwind and enjoy myself for a couple of hours, and Green Lantern worked for me."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":276805,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.5},"contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2011-06-17","keywords":"comicbook movie,ring,spacecraft,alien,magical ring","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Green Lantern - 3D Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3445005593","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA3NDkxNjQ3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzAzOTgzNQ@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDA3NDkxNjQ3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzAzOTgzNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A test pilot is granted a mystical green ring that bestows him with otherworldly powers, as well as membership into an intergalactic squadron tasked with keeping peace within the universe. more Â»"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005351/","name":"Ryan Reynolds"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0515116/","name":"Blake Lively"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0765597/","name":"Peter Sarsgaard"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0132709/","name":"Martin Campbell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0033149/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0283444/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075528/","name":"Greg Berlanti"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0338169/","name":"Michael Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0973233/","name":"Marc Guggenheim"}],"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion) 

7.5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":391357,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman","dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion) 

7.5/10","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":391357,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1,"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"],"duration":"PT1H57M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Cars 2
Auti 2
programme.desc:
Cars 2: Directed by John Lasseter, Bradford Lewis. With Larry the Cable Guy, Owen Wilson, Michael Caine, Emily Mortimer. Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espionage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1216475/","name":"Cars 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTUzNTc3MTU3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMzIxNTc3NA@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Star race car Lightning McQueen and his pal Mater head overseas to compete in the World Grand Prix race. But the road to the championship becomes rocky as Mater gets caught up in an intriguing adventure of his own: international espi","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1216475/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"atrpunk"},"dateCreated":"2011-06-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Not what my kids and I expected...","reviewBody":"Espionage, assassinations, sabotage of renewable energy, propaganda, corporate cover-ups, media manipulation and The Mob...

James Bond? Nope. Jason Bourne? Nope. 

Disney/Pixar's CARS 2. Wow. This movie wasn't at all what I was expecting. In the second serving of Lightning McQueen and his pals, they take their show to the international stage in a world championship race-off sponsored by oil-alternative manufacturer, Allinol. But turmoil behind the scenes pulls the gang into a world of spies, the Mob, Big Oil, evil German scientists and hit men. Now they have to save the world before it's too late. Oh, and they race too. The animation is amazing. Water, large balloons, backgrounds during races...pay attention because the quality of the graphics in this one are world-class. There are some goofy, funny moments and some nice one- liners for the older crowd. The themes of being true to yourself and bonds of friendship run strong throughout this film but it's the remainder of the message that worried me. There were non-stop put downs throughout and some other questionable topics. I was beginning to question the G rating when the villain ordered his henchmen to "kill" several other cars. Thinking back to the innocence and the good spirit of the first movie, I began to wonder how we got from there to here. Adventures in racing take a back-seat to the more mature plot of an espionage thriller. Looking around the theater, I could tell that kids younger than 4 or 5 were beginning to get lost. Even my ten-year-old had a hard time understanding the socio-political messages. On top of all that, I'd be willing to bet that Cars 2 is a contender for most guns, explosions and bullets fired in a G-Rated movie. This movie had much more violence than the first one.

Aside from the appropriateness of the movie, it wasn't bad. All the likable characters from the first movie were back with bigger roles like 'Mater & Luigi and there were many new characters added that also brought their own personalities into the mix. To me, this was an espionage-thriller so the added bonus of some comedy made the movie move right along at a good pace. 

It was engaging for me, I enjoyed it, but the entire time I couldn't help but wonder why Disney/Pixar chose to tell this story through a kids movie.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":173686,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-06-24","keywords":"car race,car,best friend,spy,conspiracy","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Â“Tokyo PartyÂ”","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1822465049","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM4MjE0MDk4M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzk3OTMzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A clip from Cars 2"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1249256/","name":"Larry the Cable Guy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000323/","name":"Michael Caine"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506977/","name":"Bradford Lewis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Witches
Vještice Roalda Dahla
programme.desc:
The Witches: Directed by Robert Zemeckis. With Chris Rock, Jahzir Bruno, Octavia Spencer, Brian Bovell. A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0805647/","name":"The Witches","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjRkYjlhMjEtYzIwOC00ZWYzLTgyMmQtYjI5M2UzNDJkNTU2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A young boy and his grandmother have a run-in with a coven of witches and their leader.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0805647/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sleepin_Dragon"},"dateCreated":"2020-11-09","inLanguage":"English","name":"Please make these awful remakes stop.","reviewBody":"Oh Dear,

This should have been good, it needed to be good, sadly it just isn't. It's one of those films where a remake didn't seem to be necessary, but as someone that loved Roald Dahl as a child my interest was peaked.

It's inconsistent throughout, did they perhaps rush it because of Covid? The special effects look decent in parts, and woeful in others, Anne Hathaway displays personality it's fair to say, but her accent..... If anyone remembers Rentaghost, think Miss Popov, she spans countries from Ireland to Russia, it had me chuckling.

Once again, please, please try and give us something new and original, stop taking things that have already been made, and making them ten times worse. An extra point for casting the wonderful Josette Simon.

It made me want to watch Anjelica Huston.

I paid to download it, that money could have gone on something less awful, like a Donny Osmond cd.

Naff, 3/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":3}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34413,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.3},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2020-10-22","keywords":"based on novel,witch,european literature on screen,taking off shoes,barefoot female","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1302249753","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcxZmI2NzQtYjMxZi00YWE0LWI2M2YtOTBkY2FmNThhYTNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjcxZmI2NzQtYjMxZi00YWE0LWI2M2YtOTBkY2FmNThhYTNhXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"In late 1967, a young orphaned boy (Bruno) goes to live with his Grandma (Spencer) in the rural Alabama town of Demopolis. As the boy and his grandmother encounter some deceptively glamorous but thoroughly diabolical witches, she wisely whisks our young hero away to an opulent seaside resort. Regrettably, they arrive at precisely the same time that the world's Grand High Witch (Hathaway) has gathered her fellow cronies from around the globe to carry out her nefarious plans."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004266/","name":"Anne Hathaway"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0818055/","name":"Octavia Spencer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001804/","name":"Stanley Tucci"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0038131/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0016350/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000709/","name":"Robert Zemeckis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1244069/","name":"Kenya Barris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0868219/","name":"Guillermo del Toro"}],"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Succession
Nasljeđe
programme.desc:
Succession: Created by Jesse Armstrong. With Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox, Kieran Culkin, Peter Friedman. The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7660850/","name":"Succession","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDE0ODVlYjktNjJiMC00ODk4LWIwNTktMWRhZmZiOGFhYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7660850/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"maniepranav"},"dateCreated":"2020-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another HBO drama destined for prestige TV status.","reviewBody":"Why I was attracted to watching Succession in the first place was because I had heard that it had no likeable characters. Coupled with a backdrop of corporate America, it seemed like a show right up my alley. I had absolutely no idea that the show would exceed my expectations by a large mile.

Not since The Sopranos have I seen an interplay of character dynamics this good, especially the toxic traits of those characters. Every little interaction is important, and affects another character on some or the other level significantly. Succession makes sure that behind the gaudy, showy nature of the Roy family, the ugliness of their existence is visible to you, even in the most subtle ways. The show both revels in and critiques the world it bases itself in. And I don't remember a character-driven drama being this thrilling. Hostile takeovers are usually not exciting to people uninterested in the financial world, but this show makes sure you understand the stakes involved. Like, Breaking Bad-level of tense.

Of course, much of this is possible because of the phenomenal cast. I want Jeremy Strong to win an Emmy this year so badly. Kendall Roy is one of the most brilliant (and surprisingly sympathetic) characters I've seen, a mixture of Christopher Moltisanti and Jesse Pinkman, with a slice of your average venture capitalist. I just hope it doesn't typecast him as a Wall Street-type, although I love him in The Big Short too. I want him to win more than Brian Cox, who scares the living daylights out of me as Logan Roy when he merely enters a room. Then there's Sarah Snook as the prideful Shiv, an excellent, pitch-perfect arc like no other. And my man Kieran Culkin as the foul-mouthed-but-concerned Roman, another truly surprising sympathetic turn. And of course, when I talk about Roman, I will talk about Gerri, a role that actress J Smith Cameron absolutely kills, and should have received an Emmy nomination for. And this paragraph is incomplete without my love for Matthew McFadyen and Nicholas Braun in the most hilariously paired people that are Tom and (cousin) Greg since Chris and Paulie Walnuts.

Succession doesn't mince words (or chicken hahahaha). Nothing on the script feels wasted. And the insults are ingenious. As long as Jesse Armstrong remains showrunner, this show will surprise us in the most insane of ways. The research shows (the writers' room is apparently asked to read the Financial Times everyday), and it adds to the authenticity of the show, one which I appreciate. I would also be stupid not to talk about the best original opening theme I have ever heard in any TV show. Nicholas Britell has made a masterful score which does not sound excessive at all. Much like in Mr Robot, the score amplifies the mood.

If you're watching Succession, don't be thrown off by the first 2 episodes of the show (I actually like them). Give it time, because by the 6th episode you'll probably fall off your bed. And come season 2 (which I consider one of the greatest executions of anything in television history because it's flawless), you'll drop your jaw every 25-30 minutes of screentime, which is basically every halftime moment of an episode.

Succession deserves every honor coming its way. HBO has landed another absolute winner in its roster, one that will likely age extremely well with a season or two and be compared to the other Golden Age dramas of this generation. Yes, by that, I mean shows like Mad Men, Breaking Bad, The Leftovers, and maybe, just maybe, The Wire and The Sopranos. Good call on ditching Westworld for marketing this, HBO. This is arguably going to be my favorite deconstruction of capitalism right now.

I can't wait for season 3 at all. I'm just going to rewatch season 2 till then. All the white kids fight for a kiss from daddy, and that might not sell the show a lot. But the fight spins into so many nuances it's hard to look away and just dismiss them as that.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":82431,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"media empire,patriarchy,wealth,dysfunctional family,business","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002609/","name":"Nicholas Braun"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001085/","name":"Kieran Culkin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702468/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770923/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104036/","name":"Jesse Armstrong"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3233792793","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season two, Logan Roy begins Season three in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances. IMDb data; ttnr: 7660850, Title: Succession, --- Description: Succession: Created by Jesse Armstrong. With Nicholas Braun, Brian Cox, Kieran Culkin, Peter Friedman. The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7660850/","name":"Succession","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDE0ODVlYjktNjJiMC00ODk4LWIwNTktMWRhZmZiOGFhYmUwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTkxNjUyNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The Roy family is known for controlling the biggest media and entertainment company in the world. However, their world changes when their father steps down from the company.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7660850/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"maniepranav","dateCreated":"2020-08-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Another HBO drama destined for prestige TV status.","reviewBody":"Why I was attracted to watching Succession in the first place was because I had heard that it had no likeable characters. Coupled with a backdrop of corporate America, it seemed like a show right up my alley. I had absolutely no idea that the show would exceed my expectations by a large mile.

Not since The Sopranos have I seen an interplay of character dynamics this good, especially the toxic traits of those characters. Every little interaction is important, and affects another character on some or the other level significantly. Succession makes sure that behind the gaudy, showy nature of the Roy family, the ugliness of their existence is visible to you, even in the most subtle ways. The show both revels in and critiques the world it bases itself in. And I don't remember a character-driven drama being this thrilling. Hostile takeovers are usually not exciting to people uninterested in the financial world, but this show makes sure you understand the stakes involved. Like, Breaking Bad-level of tense.

Of course, much of this is possible because of the phenomenal cast. I want Jeremy Strong to win an Emmy this year so badly. Kendall Roy is one of the most brilliant (and surprisingly sympathetic) characters I've seen, a mixture of Christopher Moltisanti and Jesse Pinkman, with a slice of your average venture capitalist. I just hope it doesn't typecast him as a Wall Street-type, although I love him in The Big Short too. I want him to win more than Brian Cox, who scares the living daylights out of me as Logan Roy when he merely enters a room. Then there's Sarah Snook as the prideful Shiv, an excellent, pitch-perfect arc like no other. And my man Kieran Culkin as the foul-mouthed-but-concerned Roman, another truly surprising sympathetic turn. And of course, when I talk about Roman, I will talk about Gerri, a role that actress J Smith Cameron absolutely kills, and should have received an Emmy nomination for. And this paragraph is incomplete without my love for Matthew McFadyen and Nicholas Braun in the most hilariously paired people that are Tom and (cousin) Greg since Chris and Paulie Walnuts.

Succession doesn't mince words (or chicken hahahaha). Nothing on the script feels wasted. And the insults are ingenious. As long as Jesse Armstrong remains showrunner, this show will surprise us in the most insane of ways. The research shows (the writers' room is apparently asked to read the Financial Times everyday), and it adds to the authenticity of the show, one which I appreciate. I would also be stupid not to talk about the best original opening theme I have ever heard in any TV show. Nicholas Britell has made a masterful score which does not sound excessive at all. Much like in Mr Robot, the score amplifies the mood.

If you're watching Succession, don't be thrown off by the first 2 episodes of the show (I actually like them). Give it time, because by the 6th episode you'll probably fall off your bed. And come season 2 (which I consider one of the greatest executions of anything in television history because it's flawless), you'll drop your jaw every 25-30 minutes of screentime, which is basically every halftime moment of an episode.

Succession deserves every honor coming its way. HBO has landed another absolute winner in its roster, one that will likely age extremely well with a season or two and be compared to the other Golden Age dramas of this generation. Yes, by that, I mean shows like Mad Men, Breaking Bad, The Leftovers, and maybe, just maybe, The Wire and The Sopranos. Good call on ditching Westworld for marketing this, HBO. This is arguably going to be my favorite deconstruction of capitalism right now.

I can't wait for season 3 at all. I'm just going to rewatch season 2 till then. All the white kids fight for a kiss from daddy, and that might not sell the show a lot. But the fight spins into so many nuances it's hard to look away and just dismiss them as that.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":82431,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2018-06-03","keywords":"media empire,patriarchy,wealth,dysfunctional family,business","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1002609/","name":"Nicholas Braun","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004051/","name":"Brian Cox","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001085/","name":"Kieran Culkin"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186190/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0702468/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0770923/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1104036/","name":"Jesse Armstrong"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 3 Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3233792793","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjgxZDg0ZGItNTY4Ny00MmQ4LTg4M2QtNjA4NDYzMGI3Y2JiXkEyXkFqcGdeQWxiaWFtb250._V1_.jpg","description":"Ambushed by his rebellious son Kendall at the end of Season two, Logan Roy begins Season three in a perilous position, scrambling to secure familial, political, and financial alliances. programme.desc: The Wizard of Lies: Directed by Barry Levinson. With Robert De Niro, Diana Henriques, Nathan Darrow, Alessandro Nivola. The fall of Bernie Madoff, whose Ponzi scheme robbed $65 billion from unsuspecting victims; the largest fraud in U.S. history." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1933667/","name":"The Wizard of Lies","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNDIxOTMxNzc1Ml5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMzgyOTUxMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The fall of Bernie Madoff, whose Ponzi scheme robbed $65 billion from unsuspecting victims; the largest fraud in U.S. history.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1933667/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Br4ve-trave1or"},"dateCreated":"2017-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Prepare yourself","reviewBody":"Some reviews argue that it should have been a mini series but I argue the opposite, this is perfection! To add would only dilute it. Yes, your left pleading for more but that's not because it's left unsatisfactory. No, it's because during the entire film, you're absolutely riveted and captivated! People, this is Barry Levinsons film, headed by De Niro and Michelle Pheifer! Levinson is a genius at his craft as are the formers. This film is bleak and at times depressing but I promise you never for a second not so engaged in it! De Niro becomes Madoff physically even the way he walks. The cast is incredible. Finally De Niro immersed himself into a character that can portray his craft. This is one vehicle, the cast-directing-editing, that sums up to make a masterpiece! This is by far the most captivating, engaging, riveting movie I've seen this year by far! Do yourself a favor and watch this immediately!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24225,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2017-05-20","keywords":"financial fraud,financier,ponzi scheme,fraudster,fraud","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tonight 8/7c","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi42121497","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDQxNTU0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODkxODczMjI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTY3MDQxNTU0OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODkxODczMjI@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story of Bernie Madoff and his Ponzi scheme."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000201/","name":"Michelle Pfeiffer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005273/","name":"Alessandro Nivola"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001469/","name":"Barry Levinson"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0063961/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0506094/","name":"Sam Levinson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2331718/","name":"John Burnham Schwartz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1345603/","name":"Samuel Baum"}],"duration":"PT2H13M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hemingway & Gellhorn
Hemingway i Gellhorn
programme.desc: Hemingway & Gellhorn: Directed by Philip Kaufman. With Nicole Kidman, Clive Owen, David Strathairn, Rodrigo Santoro. A drama centered on the romance between Ernest Hemingway and World War II correspondent Martha Gellhorn, Hemingway's inspiration for For Whom the Bell Tolls, and the only woman who ever asked for a divorce from the writer." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0423455/","name":"Hemingway & Gellhorn","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ1OTM3OTY0MF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTY4MDU4Nw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama centered on the romance between Ernest Hemingway and World War II correspondent Martha Gellhorn, Hemingway's inspiration for For Whom the Bell Tolls, and the only woman who ever asked for a divorce from the writer.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0423455/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CryptoGuy"},"dateCreated":"2012-06-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Shallow Attempt","reviewBody":"I was really disappointed in this movie. The build up and anticipation for it was great. I had high expectations. With Clive Owen and Nicole Kidman leading the charge, it was Kaufman's to screw up, and screw it up he did.\n\nThe characters were shallow, but they fit right in with the ankle deep script. I thought the historic film gimmick was overplayed and laughable at times. Clive Owen tried his hardest to bring life to Stahl and Turner's straw-man. Hemingway never had any real motive and when it appeared that he might, it was abandoned. Nicole Kidman did a fine job as well, but it had to be long days and frustrating nights with the stiff dialogue. The supporting cast was lifeless, filled with assumptions, and caricatures of an era. Watching this film was like watching an artist that promised to paint you a masterpiece then he pulled out a mop. This was sloppy film-making and it started with the script and ended with the director. A poor showing for such a rich subject.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":9450,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2012-05-28","keywords":"war correspondent,writer,divorce,winter war,spanish civil war","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000173/","name":"Nicole Kidman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0654110/","name":"Clive Owen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000657/","name":"David Strathairn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0442241/","name":"Philip Kaufman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0186937/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0331056/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0821466/","name":"Jerry Stahl"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0193009/","name":"Barbara Turner"}],"duration":"PT2H35M"}</script><metacontent="
